name: Tub Thumpin' - Gettin' Wet
description:
Well timed taps will secure the best bathtub experience.

- Controls -

START GAME: Shift

BONTAM (P1): Left Shift

VANNA (P2): Right Shift

Created by: Spencer Steers, Macy Lytle and Evan Grice. Made over 48 hours during the weekend of The Global Game Jam 2019. Made from home. Not officially a GGJ19 game but the theme of, "Home" was used.
